module.name: dpkg
module.summary: Policy for the Debian package manager.

interface.name: dpkg_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute dpkg programs in the dpkg domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dpkg_domtrans_script
interface.summary: Execute dpkg_script programs in the dpkg_script domain.

interface.name: dpkg_run
interface.summary: Execute dpkg programs in the dpkg domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to allow the dpkg domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the dpkg domain to use.

interface.name: dpkg_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from dpkg.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dpkg_read_pipes
interface.summary: Read from an unnamed dpkg pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dpkg_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write an unnamed dpkg pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dpkg_use_script_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from dpkg scripts.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dpkg_manage_db
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the dpkg package database.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dpkg_dontaudit_manage_db
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, and delete the dpkg package database.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
